title: Black bean salsa
ingredients: ['3 (400g) tins black beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (340g) tin sweetcorn, drained', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes, partially drained', '2 tomatoes, diced', '2 bunches spring onions, chopped', '1 to 2 green chillies, seeded and minced', '1 bunch fresh coriander, finely chopped']
